createTime.description: Time the test matrix was created.

invalidMatrixDetails.description:
Code that describes why the test matrix is considered invalid. Only set for
 matrices in the INVALID state.

outcomeSummary.description: Outcome summary of the test matrix.

resultStorage.description: Locations where test results are stored.

clientInfo.description: Information provided by the client that created the test matrix.

TestMatrixEventData.description: The data within all Firebase test matrix events.

details.description: Map of detailed information about the client.

ClientInfo.description: Information about the client which invoked the test.

toolResultsHistory.description:
Tool Results history resource containing test results. Format is
 `projects/{project_id}/histories/{history_id}`.
 See https://firebase.google.com/docs/test-lab/reference/toolresults/rest
 for more information.

toolResultsExecution.description:
Tool Results execution resource containing test results. Format is
 `projects/{project_id}/histories/{history_id}/executions/{execution_id}`.
 Optional, can be omitted in erroneous test states.
 See https://firebase.google.com/docs/test-lab/reference/toolresults/rest
 for more information.

resultsUri.description: URI to the test results in the Firebase Web Console.

gcsPath.description:
Location in Google Cloud Storage where test results are written to.
 In the form "gs://bucket/path/to/somewhere".

ResultStorage.description: Locations where test results are stored.
